Use the `sbb-tab-amount` tag in combination with the `sbb-tab-title` component in order to show an amount to the right of the tab button label.

```html
<sbb-tab-title>
  Tab Label
  <sbb-tab-amount>123</sbb-tab-amount>
</sbb-tab-title>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                   |
| ----------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `"unnamed"` | Slot to render an amount next to a tab label. |
